name: Project Aegis
description:
An idea I had. Geometry Wars without guns. Use your shield to push enemies into hazards and hazards into enemies.

Note: If you're using a gamepad you must hit a button before it'll let you use the analog sticks due to a bug.

Controls:

  • WASD / Left Stick - move the ship
  • Mouse / Right Stick - rotate the ship
